Faded but still legible, the mark of a Kara-Taranforgemaster adorns the pommel of this exquisite sword. Light as a robin's wing, quick as gnomish wit, this weapon has unseamed many foes - and will continue to, in the correct hands.

Scimitar Light Finesse
